summary: Fix Training Block Generation metric propagation by preserving category-specific metrics (contacts, distance, duration, percentMaxIntensity) through the API and UI layers. 9 code changes across 3 files with typecheck gates between phases.

phases.name: API Layer - analysis.ts
phases.description: Fix 5 drop points in analysis.ts where category-specific metrics are filtered out during extraction and AI prompt generation

subtasks.description: Fix workoutExercises extraction (lines 58-65) - Add contacts, distance, duration, percentMaxIntensity, timeTarget to the map function
acceptanceCriteria: workoutExercises.map includes contacts field
workoutExercises.map includes distance field
workoutExercises.map includes duration field
workoutExercises.map includes percentMaxIntensity field
workoutExercises.map includes timeTarget field

subtasks.description: Fix exerciseReplacements.original (lines 106-114) - Add category-specific metrics to the original object returned
acceptanceCriteria: original object includes contacts, distance, duration, percentMaxIntensity, timeTarget fields

subtasks.description: Fix blockData for AI context (lines 141-147) - Include metrics in data sent to AI for analysis
acceptanceCriteria: AI context includes contacts, distance, duration, percentMaxIntensity in exercise data

subtasks.description: Fix AI prompt JSON format (lines 186-192) - Update prompt to request metric fields in response and add preservation rule
acceptanceCriteria: AI prompt JSON format includes contacts, distance, duration, percentMaxIntensity fields
CRITICAL RULES section includes rule 7 for preserving category-specific metrics

subtasks.description: Fix fallback response (lines 211-223) - Preserve metrics from original exercise when AI unavailable
acceptanceCriteria: Both if and else branches include contacts, distance, duration, percentMaxIntensity from replacement.original

phases.gateCondition: npm run typecheck must pass with no errors

phases.name: API Layer - templates.ts
phases.description: Fix 2 drop points in templates.ts where metrics are not accepted in args schema and not output to snapshot

subtasks.description: Fix args schema (lines 23-30) - Add optional metric fields to exercises array validator
acceptanceCriteria: Args schema includes v.optional(v.number()) for contacts
Args schema includes v.optional(v.number()) for distance
Args schema includes v.optional(v.number()) for duration
Args schema includes v.optional(v.number()) for percentMaxIntensity

subtasks.description: Fix output mapping (lines 142-151) - Include metrics in workout snapshot output
acceptanceCriteria: Output mapping includes contacts: ex.contacts
Output mapping includes distance: ex.distance
Output mapping includes duration: ex.duration
Output mapping includes percentMaxIntensity: ex.percentMaxIntensity

phases.gateCondition: npm run typecheck must pass with no errors

phases.name: UI Layer - GenerateNextBlockDialog.tsx
phases.description: Fix 2 locations in the dialog component for metric passthrough and display

subtasks.description: Fix handleGenerate field passthrough (lines 97-103) - Pass category-specific metrics to backend mutation
acceptanceCriteria: handleGenerate maps contacts, distance, duration, percentMaxIntensity from exercise objects

subtasks.description: Fix metric display (lines 210-212) - Add conditional rendering for contacts-based, distance-based, and duration-based exercises
acceptanceCriteria: Contacts-based exercises show 'X x Y contacts'
Distance-based exercises show 'X x Y x Zm'
Speed training shows 'X x Y x Zm @P%'
Duration-based exercises show 'X x Y x Zs'
Traditional exercises fallback to 'X x Y'

phases.gateCondition: npm run typecheck must pass with no errors

phases.name: Browser Testing Validation
phases.description: End-to-end validation using browser-cli to verify metrics display correctly in Generate Next Block feature

subtasks.description: Navigate to Training Calendar and authenticate as coach
acceptanceCriteria: Successfully logged in as coach
Training Calendar page loaded

subtasks.description: Open Training Anchors panel and select a block with plyometric/speed exercises
acceptanceCriteria: Training Anchors panel visible
Block with category-specific exercises selected

subtasks.description: Click Generate Next Block and verify Suggested Workout Structure displays correct metrics
acceptanceCriteria: Contacts-based shows 'X x Y contacts' not 'X x'
Distance-based shows 'X x Y x Zm'
Speed training shows intensity percentage
Duration-based shows seconds
Screenshot captured as evidence

subtasks.description: Create the new block and verify metrics persisted to database
acceptanceCriteria: New training block marker created
Convex logs show metrics in snapshot data

phases.gateCondition: All acceptance criteria met with visual evidence

risks.description: AI prompt changes may affect response parsing
risks.mitigation: Test fallback path first to ensure it works without AI

risks.description: Type coercion issues with optional numeric fields
risks.mitigation: Use v.optional(v.number()) and handle undefined in UI conditionals

risks.description: Existing training blocks may lack metric data
risks.mitigation: UI gracefully falls back to sets x reps when metrics are null/undefined
